metadataAttributes.Title: Methods and Statistics in Social Sciences Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Critically Analyze Research and Results Using R. Learn to recognize sloppy science, perform solid research and do appropriate data analysis.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Statistics, Statistical Inference, R Programming, Qualitative Research, Confidence Interval, Statistical Hypothesis Testing, Regression Analysis, Analysis Of Variance (ANOVA),
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Annemarie Zand Scholten ,Gerben Moerman ,Matthijs Rooduijn ,Emiel van Loon ,
